alert.note: Alert for Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 10:37PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN ON TOP OF FRESH SNOW AND ICE... Heavy rain is expected to follow the snow and wintry mix that are currently progressing from south to north over the Panhandle. The transition to rain will happen as the front moves north through SE AK. Rain will be heavy at times through Thursday night. The primary concern is not snow totals, but rather heavy rain on top of fresh snow and/or pre-existing snow and ice. With the ground still frozen, runoff will become excessive, overloading storm drains and culverts quickly. Additionally, ponding of water on roadways will create hazardous driving conditions. Ponding of water on airport runways will also impact aviation operations. Daily rainfall totals will be well above normal for this time of the year and may result in new daily precipitation records.

area.areaDesc: Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
